meanings.definition: A person who has a fear or hatred of cats.
meanings.sent1: Some people are ailurophobes and feel scared when they see a cat.
meanings.sent2: Ailurophobes may avoid visiting friends who have pet cats.
meanings.sent3: The ailurophobes at the party panicked when a cat unexpectedly walked in.
meanings.sent4: Her extreme fear of cats turned her into an ailurophobe, always on edge.
meanings.sent5: The ailurophobes in the movie theater screamed when a cat appeared on screen.
